list.en: Do you smoke a lot?
Do you feel like smoking?
Do you mind my smoking here?
list.cn: 你介意我在这里抽烟吗?

list.en: Do you smoke this kind of cigarettes?
I guess you don't smoke, right?
He has a habit of smoking.
I forget that you dislike smoking.
I have the last cigarette. Would you like the one?
list.cn: 我还有最后一支烟。你喜欢这个吗?

list.en: He has the habits of smoking after meals.
He loves smoking. Every one of my family always asked him to give up but he never cared.
list.cn: 他喜欢抽烟。我家里的每个人都叫他放弃，但他从不在乎。

list.en: Smoking is bad for your health.
Smoking is a nasty habit.
I'm going to stop smoking when I finish this pack of cigarettes.
list.cn: 我抽完这包烟就打算戒烟。

list.en: Should I have to stop smoking?
I've decided to give up smoking.
How do you know you can give up smoking?
list.cn: 你怎么知道你可以戒烟?

list.en: This is a non smoking section, isn't it?
The doctor advised me to give up smoking.
The doctor warned the patient against smoking.
list.cn: 医生告诫病人不要吸烟。

list.en: I can tell you some advantages of stopping smoking and then you can decide what to do.
list.cn: 我可以告诉你戒烟的一些好处，然后你可以决定怎么做。

list.en: Use the note to remind yourself of why you want to stop whenever you feel like smoking.
list.cn: 当你想戒烟的时候，用这张便条提醒自己为什么要戒烟。

list.en: Did you hear about tummy tuck?
list.cn: 你听说过腹部整形手术吗?

list.en: Plastic surgery is very popular.
I heard most of the Korean actresses have had plastic surgery.
list.cn: 我听说大部分韩国女演员都做过整形手术。

list.en: Many people suspect that she has had a breast enlargement surgery.
list.cn: 许多人怀疑她做过隆胸手术。

list.en: I'm ready for a lift.
Last month I had a double eyelid operation.
list.cn: 上个月我做了双眼皮手术。

list.en: I still remember she's moon face, but now is the oval face.
list.cn: 我还记得她的月亮脸，但现在是鹅蛋脸。

list.en: Facelift is becoming increasingly popular over time.
list.cn: 随着时间的推移，整容手术越来越受欢迎。

list.en: I bet she has had a no surgery.
list.cn: 我敢说她肯定做过手术。

list.en: I just feel myself so fat that I want to do a liposuction.
list.cn: 我只是觉得自己太胖了，想做个抽脂手术。

list.en: What kind of guys do you like?
I like those guys who are bold but cautious.
list.cn: 我喜欢那种大胆而谨慎的人。

list.en: What's the most important trait that you think men should have?
list.cn: 你认为男人应该具备的最重要的品质是什么?

list.en: What about his appearance?
No one wants to marry a vulgar shrew.
list.cn: 没有人愿意娶一个粗俗的泼妇。

list.en: I can't stand a man who smokes and drinks a lot.
list.cn: 我不能忍受一个又抽烟又喝酒的人。

list.en: Man should be responsible and loyal.
list.cn: 人应该是负责任和忠诚的。

list.en: You are most suitable for a man with same culture background.
list.cn: 你最适合找一个有相同文化背景的男人。

list.en: I dislike the men who keenly care about their own interests.
list.cn: 我不喜欢那些只关心自己利益的人。

list.en: I'm not interested in women who always snag about trifles.
list.cn: 我对那些总是为小事争吵不休的女人不感兴趣。

list.en: He drunk.
He's tipsy.
He's wasted.
He's as strong as.
He's as strong as a skunk.
He drank himself under the table.
He's tanked.
He's pickled.
He's stone drunk.
He's three sheets to the wind.
Your little garden is fabulous.
Here you are in my garden.
There are so many beautiful flowers in your garden.
list.cn: 你的花园里有那么多漂亮的花。

list.en: I mow the lawn every week.
The flowers look terrific.
I am going to water my flowers.
I received a set of gardening tools on my birthday.
list.cn: 我生日那天收到一套园艺工具。

list.en: Mary talked with me across the garden fence.
list.cn: 玛丽隔着花园篱笆和我谈话。

list.en: He is building a greenhouse in his garden.
Gardening is a very rewarding pastime.
list.cn: 园艺是一种非常有益的消遣。

list.en: I have been taking care of our garden for a long time.
list.cn: 我照料我们的花园已经很长时间了。

list.en: He's been gardening all day.
He spends his spare time gardening.
list.cn: 他把业余时间用在园艺上。

list.en: What kinds of activities do you prefer?
Did you have a good time?
It is the match that intensified our team spirit. I went cycling with my classmates.
list.cn: 正是这场比赛增强了我们的团队精神。我和同学一起去骑自行车。

list.en: Would you be interested in going to the horse race tomorrow?
list.cn: 你明天有兴趣去看赛马吗?

list.en: I become interested in the activities.
list.cn: 我对这些活动产生了兴趣。

list.en: Activities do a lot of good to our body and mind.
list.cn: 活动对我们的身心有很多好处。

list.en: You look so young and energetic after you finish the activity.
list.cn: 活动结束后，你看起来如此年轻和充满活力。

list.en: My favorite activity is bowling.
list.cn: 我最喜欢的活动是打保龄球。

list.en: Rope skipping can help you lose weight.
Would you like to join the cycling?
list.cn: 你想参加自行车运动吗?

list.en: I won the first prize in the painting match.
list.cn: 我在绘画比赛中得了第一名。

list.en: What are you reading recently?
Have you finish reading the novel you bought last week?
list.cn: 你看完上周买的那本小说了吗?

list.en: What's the current best seller?
list.cn: 现在最畅销的是什么书?

list.en: There was nothing interesting in the paper today.
list.cn: 今天的报纸上没有什么有趣的新闻。

list.en: I only finished half of it.
Is the latest issue of the magazine out?
list.cn: 最新一期的杂志出版了吗?

list.en: There's nothing better than reading something.
list.cn: 没有什么比读书更好的了。

list.en: What's your favorite magazine?
list.cn: 你最喜欢的杂志是什么?

list.en: Please recommend me a reading list.
You don't have to read every word, just skim it.
list.cn: 你不必每个字都读，略读一下就可以了。

list.en: I wish I had more time for reading.
list.cn: 我希望我有更多的时间读书。

list.en: I could hardly open a book these days.
list.cn: 这些天我几乎无法打开一本书。

list.cn: 请永远把我从你的通话名单中删除。

list.en: I will not need your products in the future.
list.cn: 我以后不需要你们的产品了。

list.en: I don't have time to talk right now.
list.cn: 我现在没时间和你说话。

list.en: How did you get my name?

list.en: Please take me off your list.
list.cn: 请把我从你的名单上去掉。
